name: Aarong Dairy Pure Ghee
description:
Aarong Dairy Pure Ghee 200 gm is a premium quality ghee made from fresh cream of pure cow’s milk. It is hygienically prepared and free from any artificial flavors or preservatives. The ghee is great for preparing polao, korma, biriyani, paratha, halwa, or any other sweet dish. It is rich in vitamins A, D, E, and K, which are important for ensuring normal cellular function and growth in humans.

name: Radhuni Premium Ghee
description:
To fascinate the flavors of traditional cuisines, Square Food & Beverage Ltd. has brought the Radhuni Premium Ghee in the market. Radhuni Premium Ghee can be used widely, adding a premium taste to a variety of dishes, like polao, biriyani, paratha and cooking various sweet items. Radhuni Premium Ghee ensures the aroma and taste of the dishes made with it. For any feast and festival, Radhuni Premium Ghee is a must!

name: Ultra Ghee
description:
Ultra Ghee is a rich source of vitamins, antioxidants, and healthy fats. While fat should be consumed in moderation, studies show that eating fatty foods such as ghee can help the body absorb some essential vitamins and minerals. Cooking healthy foods and vegetables with ghee may help you absorb more nutrients.

name: Parboti Ghee
description:
Parboti Ghee is made from pure, clarified butter, offering a rich, nutty flavor. The 300 gm pack is ideal for cooking, baking, or enhancing the flavor of traditional dishes. It is a healthier option for preparing food, giving your meals a luxurious texture and taste. Perfect for use in various cuisines and sweets.

name: The Eastern Pickle Company Ghee
description:
Introducing The Eastern Pickle Company's Ghee, a sumptuous indulgence offered in a convenient 350g container. Immerse your culinary creations in the rich and aromatic essence of this expertly prepared clarified butter. Masterfully crafted, this Ghee captures the pure essence of butter, carefully simmered to perfection to extract its rich flavors and aromatic notes. The result is a velvety, golden substance that adds a luxurious depth to your cooking and enhances the taste of your dishes.

name: Meena sweets Ghee
description:
Ghee, also known as clarified butter, is a type of fat used in various culinary traditions, including Indian, Middle Eastern, and Southeast Asian cuisines. While ghee itself is not sweet, it plays a crucial role in making many sweet dishes and desserts.

name: Kishwan Premium Ghee
description:
Kishwan Premium Ghee 400 gm is more than just clarified butter; it's a culinary treasure that elevates your dishes to new heights. With its unmatched purity and richness, this ghee is the perfect companion for your kitchen, allowing you to explore the world of flavors and aromas like never before. Savor the authenticity and tradition of Kishwan Premium Ghee in every meal.

name: Sun Premium Ghee
description:
Sun Premium Ghee 200g is a high-quality, pure ghee made from the finest milk, offering a rich, aromatic, and nutritious addition to your cooking. Known for its rich flavor and health benefits, this ghee is perfect for enhancing the taste of your meals or used in traditional cooking methods like frying, sautéing, and baking. Ingredients: Pure Cow's Milk, Clarified Butterfat. Benefits:lthy Fats: Ghee is a source of healthy saturated fats that support heart health and provide energy.Lactose-Free: Ghee is naturally lactose-free, making it suitable for those with lactose intolerance.Boosts Immunity: Contains butyrate, a fatty acid that supports immune function and gut health.High Smoke Point: Ideal for cooking at high temperatures, such as frying or sautéing, without breaking down or releasing harmful chemicals.Promotes Digestion: Traditional uses of ghee include promoting digestion and soothing the stomach. Making Process: Sun Premium Ghee is made by slowly heating pure cow's milk butter, allowing the water content to evaporate and the milk solids to separate. The result is clarified butter, which is further filtered to produce pure, golden ghee with a rich, nutty flavor.
Sun Premium Ghee 200g is a high-quality, pure ghee made from the finest milk, offering a rich, aromatic, and nutritious addition to your cooking. Known for its rich flavor and health benefits, this ghee is perfect for enhancing the taste of your meals or used in traditional cooking methods like frying, sautéing, and baking.
 
Ingredients: Pure Cow's Milk, Clarified Butterfat.
 
Benefits:
lthy Fats: Ghee is a source of healthy saturated fats that support heart health and provide energy.
Lactose-Free: Ghee is naturally lactose-free, making it suitable for those with lactose intolerance.
Boosts Immunity: Contains butyrate, a fatty acid that supports immune function and gut health.
High Smoke Point: Ideal for cooking at high temperatures, such as frying or sautéing, without breaking down or releasing harmful chemicals.
Promotes Digestion: Traditional uses of ghee include promoting digestion and soothing the stomach.
 
Making Process: Sun Premium Ghee is made by slowly heating pure cow's milk butter, allowing the water content to evaporate and the milk solids to separate. The result is clarified butter, which is further filtered to produce pure, golden ghee with a rich, nutty flavor.

name: Shashya Prabartana Ghee
description:
Shashya Prabartana Ghee our Gawa Ghee, a delicious and nutritious staple of the Bengali diet since ancient times. Our ghee is made from cow’s milk and contains a large amount of butyric acid which aids in digestion, a major function of the digestive system. It’s very beneficial, especially for those suffering from constipation. Ghee works great in reducing cholesterol and helps in weight loss. Moreover, Gawa Ghee contains some healthy fats and chain fatty acids which burn bad cholesterol instead of increasing weight.
